personalInfo.name: Narendra
personalInfo.myDescription: Passionate Data Science, making useful application using the latest technologies!

responsabilities: Proficient in HTTP standards, API integrating, REST APIs and authentication, basics of building scalable solutions for Frontend.
In backend optimization SQL query for the heavy load parts of the relational database, which can improve web services user interfaces and ORMs library (SQLAlchemy).

Proficient expertise in backend services such as: Docker, Sql, Fastapi, GIT. Deploy, maintenance and testing environment on Google Cloud Platform virtual machine. Designing a Front-end developing pages using Vue, HTML, Java Script.

Familiar with developments tools and project management such as cross-system, source Controlling management (GIT), bugs Fixing in tight deadlines, troubleshooting, debug, implement (JIRA), Scrum, sprints, agile software development, DevOps and data migration. Cross-functional errors analysing, clean code, code review, test automation and enhancement for inclusion in future releases. continuous integration & continuous deployment using circleci.
Predictive Analytics : Machine Learning, NLP, AI.
Backend Developer: Python | R | Django | MYSQL | PostgreSQL | MongoDB.
Frontend Developer: VueJs | SASS | HTML | CSS | Javascript.
business intelligence: Tableau, Power Bi, MS Excel.
Describing a prototype or mock-ups of a data pipeline, addressing Data Ingestions, Data storage, transforming structured, semi-structured and unstructured data and data visualization.
Conducted effectively synthesize, and communicate through visualise, published financial data reports inquiries based on company wide data, advice on website and marketing metrics.
Handling and validation of data storage, data inconsistencies, aggregate data docker containerized, Experience in data models and data architect solutions to support internal initiative..
Building websites with Vuejs frameworks and libraries that supporting efficient dynamic web Application - e.g., Vue.js, Type scripting, SaaS, according to internal and external Administration.

Evaluate and advocate the use of various open-source technologies and third-party solution. Individual empowerment, continually improvement built into team culture and active participation in the teams meetings.
